subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt says he will skip the Golden Spike meet in Ostrava, Czech Republic, on June 17 and a Diamond League meet in Paris on July 5 because he is behind with his training after a foot injury.
snippet: Usain Bolt says he will skip the Golden Spike meet in Ostrava, Czech Republic, on June 17 and a Diamond League meet in Paris on July 5 because he is behind with his training after a foot injury.
